title: New Growth Lab Podcast Released Today
text:
A new podcast from LOCALiQ and the USA TODAY NETWORK was released today targeted towards business owners and leaders. The Growth Lab podcast explores topics in the areas of business and leadership, distilling strategies, tips and advice that can be put into practice in everyday life.

The Growth Lab’s mission is to help connect business owners and leaders to experts, new ideas, and to help them grow and thrive. With new episodes released every Tuesday, listeners have access to a downloadable action guide based on the discussion of that episode.

“We bring listeners the biggest minds in business in a fun, interview-style format along with downloadable ‘Lab Notes’ for every episode, to get you out of your head, and into action,” said Tracy Oswald, Vice President, and Producer of The Growth Lab podcast.

Podcast guests include:

Peter Shankman, Author, Entrepreneur, Futurist (HARO Founder)

Brian Moran, CEO, Small Business Edge

Jess Tyson, Owner, Director of Calm

Bryan Kramer, CEO, TedTalk, Author

Jeremy Goldman, Founder and Author

Julian Placino, Founder, TedX, Podcaster

Hillary Weiss, Messaging Strategist

Neal Polachek, Industry Advisor, Local/digital expert

Ramon Ray, Author, Speaker, Entrepreneur

Rob Ganer, Partner, Ganer +Ganer

You can listen and subscribe to the Growth Lab podcast in Apple Podcasts, Android Podcasts, and Stitcher.

Read or Share this story: https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/pr/2019/02/05/new-growth-lab-podcast-released-today/2776893002/
description: A new podcast from LOCALiQ and the USA TODAY NETWORK was released today targeted towards business owners and leaders.
